name: Instrumentl
headline: Instrumentl automates grant discovery and management for nonprofits.
description: Instrumentl is a SaaS platform that helps social enterprises discover, track and win grant funding. We force multiply the nonprofit sector's ability to deliver impact. >100% YoY growth, cash flow positive. Feel good about the work you do, join us: www.instrumentl.com/careers

#  The  complete![](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/complete-underline-c4c5dd1605c84cd2160301427e0570275555162cef15778545794466d8a78266.svg) grant platform
## Discover best-fit grants, craft winning proposals, and manage your grants — all in one place.
[Try 14 days free](https://www.instrumentl.com/</signup>)
Only **17 free trials** left this week. 
![Discover, Apply, Streamline](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/homepage-video-still-d2e2e91758257fbe75f283abaa15745c55fbfb99cf0e7ce0e1875cd0d72e4b42.png) ![Play Video](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/homepage-video-play-button-34402118cdd5209ee583bde0a19f485f14353b49004bf5d4f9a19727610a8c43.png)

You Can 
Do It All ![Do It All](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/grant-lifecycle-underline-ab612899526e0ab6f55750267d02112d20a4439954d36e12f3f2f93fda5b4e9d.svg)
With Instrumentl 
Experience the future of grant management with Instrumentl. 
![Funder insights image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Funder insights-d5800fcff2eab82fb76af9769dc04ad895c14408ea7ceb803b603def11fbe088.png)

![Past Grantees image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Past Grantees-b262ae0399df9494c0f80fb2c45026edbf58254a5f4ad64d61036f0e026d934f.png)
### Find Best-Fit Funders In Seconds, Not Weeks
Discover relevant funding instantly, explore over 20,000 expert-curated grants, and find best-fit funders from a database of over 400,000. See who is supporting your peers with Peer Prospecting.
![Overview image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Overview-81545e352143e1b78d5f6da5f7f1453a7a01072dd65868cad55e908336617d51.png)
![Grant Tracker image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Grant Tracker-d54736981333a219b18d2e07a16dea3d17a47cf0e43a559b8fcc51fa7bf8dcaf.png)
![Awards view image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Awards view-8bfe71469cf7ca24e39cdcf92707f9a6984edf9b8dfb549d5cad262530a6d692.png)
### Streamline Grant Management And Meet Every Deadline
Streamline your workflow with automated deadlines, task tracking, and portfolio overviews. Boost teamwork with shared docs, reminders, and calendar integration. Tailor the platform to fit your needs.
![Apply1 image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Apply1-2657873f771f43352c3d7f8ebad1746535a07d607377c42db7b1beb396c6128d.png)
![Apply2 image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Apply2-1439df130243be439065a2d3a8c1a883581a698f66d44717bcc483662aae8915.png)
![Apply3 image](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/features/Apply3-a768ebfb101099f0cbb451d743f9dc173de8271ad9ca7cd8d4d3f4978aa51820.png)
### Craft high-quality proposal drafts in 5 minutes
Enhance grant writing with AI that learns from past applications, resurfacing your best ideas. Centralize documents securely and access active grant applications with one click.
![five stars](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/stars-6f8d82075ab1ea48b61d35cc88cbe5f40854a91388d8f55051c9686bbdd43223.svg)

## Over **$1** billion in **active grants** from funders like:
![Amazon](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/amazon-bd81b82194871c4fce859c52fcb8730c5f3e17ad7140014406b2772bb1c21f4d.png) ![The Kresge Foundation](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/the-kresge-foundation-22ec760c1e5cb62501f2485107822cc661f485d62e35099cb34bffb22988d0e6.png) ![Patagonia](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/patagonia-1522fd93f6ec01cf2eb37a6ccd09b38689e01e0d81e90be0fa0aaeba720d1665.png) ![MacArthur Foundation](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/macarthur-foundation-0fe9152ca6bb399c1ba5df2c90eb7434c8d3aee6f5f3d5a0eb3de404ac3c7d9d.png) ![USDA](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/usda-3b0576a9313eb87ede57d265ccf7772edb9436d78d3a969ccfd3e8e469c88db8.png)

### The only complete  grant solution ![cta underline](https://static-assets.instrumentl.com/assets/revamped-homepage/cta-easy-underline-19858c876a862f69f0ff2e4f5f27e822e6410ecc2677c25d927069bc19faa9d9.svg)
Since 2015, over 4,000 organizations have used Instrumentl to find, win more grant funding, empowering them to expand their impact on critical missions such as educating children, protecting endangered species, and restoring natural habitats. 
Start your free trial

generated_description:
### Summary of Instrumentl

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S16, Instrumentl operates out of San Francisco and currently employs around 60 people. They have experienced impressive growth with over 100% year-over-year growth and are currently cash flow positive. Their mission is to empower nonprofits by automating grant discovery and management, essentially multiplying their impact. 

**What They Do**  
Instrumentl provides a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform designed specifically for social enterprises, primarily nonprofits. Their solutions streamline the entire grant management lifecycle— from discovering the right grants to applying for funding, and ultimately managing awarded grants. With a comprehensive database that includes over 20,000 expert-curated grants and insights into more than 400,000 funders, Instrumentl helps organizations maximize their funding opportunities.

### Key Features
1. **Grant Prospecting**: Identify relevant funding opportunities effortlessly and in real time.
2. **Grant Writing Tools**: Leverage AI to enhance writing efficiency and improve the quality of proposals.
3. **Grants Management**: Organize and track submissions and awards efficiently, ensuring that deadlines are met.
4. **Reporting and Insights**: Receive advanced analytics on funding sources and outcomes to inform future applications.

### Notable Clients
Instrumentl is trusted by over 4,000 nonprofits. Notable clients include NYU Langone Health, Phoenix Children’s Foundation, and Marlene Meyerson JCC Manhattan.

### Why It Matters
In a world where securing funding is crucial for the success of nonprofit missions—be it educating children, protecting wildlife, or addressing social issues—Instrumentl offers a significant edge with its tools. With features that consolidate various aspect of grant management into one platform, nonprofits can save time, enhance their communication, and, ultimately, increase their funding success.

### Getting Involved
For those interested in joining a growing team focused on making a positive impact, Instrumentl is currently hiring. More information can be found on their careers page.

Overall, Instrumentl stands out as a resource dedicated to improving the way nonprofits approach grant funding, creating a brighter future for social betterment initiatives. 

For more details, visit [Instrumentl's website](https://www.instrumentl.com).
